==Description==
Displays a form table with fields letting the user choose the primary blog.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php choose_primary_blog(); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Returns ==
This function does not return a value.

== Example ==
<pre><?php choose_primary_blog(); ?></pre>

== Source File ==
<tt>choose_primary_blog()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-admin/includes/ms.php}}.
